trans-unit.source: Retrieves a pointer to the ITEMIDLIST structure (PIDL) of a special folder

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves a pointer to the ITEMIDLIST structure (PIDL) of a special folder

target.mrk: Retrieves a pointer to the ITEMIDLIST structure (PIDL) of a special folder

trans-unit.source: The CSIDL ($CSIDL_*) that identifies the folder of interest.

seg-source.mrk: The CSIDL ($CSIDL_*) that identifies the folder of interest.

target.mrk: The CSIDL ($CSIDL_*) that identifies the folder of interest.

trans-unit.source: The PIDL specifying the folder's location relative to the root of the namespace (the desktop).

seg-source.mrk: The PIDL specifying the folder's location relative to the root of the namespace (the desktop).

target.mrk: The PIDL specifying the folder's location relative to the root of the namespace (the desktop).

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

trans-unit.source: To free the returned PIDL, call the _WinAPI_CoTaskMemFree() function.

seg-source.mrk: To free the returned PIDL, call the _WinAPI_CoTaskMemFree() function.

target.mrk: To free the returned PIDL, call the _WinAPI_CoTaskMemFree() function.
